page.title: 16RECREATION in GLAMIS
page.content:
The regular recreational activities involve on the one hand the traditionl organisations, clubs and church institutions listed under 'clubs' above, and on the other the pub and bingo hall. The two local pubs, in Glamis and Charleston, provide an opportunity for chat and contact among the community, and the bingo in Forfar is a night out.
There are irregular Discos and more traditional dances, and the annual Gala Day is now a tradition of two years standing. The organisation of such events is in itself a form of recreation for some of the community.
A number of events held at Glamis Castle, such as the Transport Extravaganza, provide a convenient day out.
